verses.verse: וְזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> ve-Zot likewise הַבְּרָכָ֗ה <S%H1293><s%> hab-be-ra-Chah, And this [is] the blessing אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֵּרַ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> be-Rach blessed מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh wherewith Moses אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> mo-To. his death

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar, And he said יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מִסִּינַ֥י <S%H5514><s%> mis-si-Nai from Sinai בָּא֙ <S%H935><s%> ba came וְזָרַ֤ח <S%H2224><s%> ve-za-Rach and rose up מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> mis-se-'Ir from Seir לָ֔מוֹ la-mo, הוֹפִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H3313><s%> ho-Fi-a' unto them he shined forth מֵהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> me-Har from mount פָּארָ֔ן <S%H6290><s%> pa-Ran, Paran וְאָתָ֖ה <S%H857><s%> ve-'a-Tah and he came מֵרִבְבֹ֣ת <S%H7233><s%> me-riv-Vot with ten thousands קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh; of saints מִֽימִינ֕וֹ <S%H3225><s%> mi-mi-No from his right hand; אֵשְׁדָּת 'e-she-dat כאֵ֥שׁ 'Esh ק; דָּ֖ת <S%H799><s%> Dat fiery law קלָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

אַ֚ף <S%H637><s%> 'af Yea חֹבֵ֣ב <S%H2245><s%> cho-Vev he loved עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim, the people כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All קְדֹשָׁ֖יו <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shav all his saints בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha; [are] in thy hand וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem and they תֻּכּ֣וּ <S%H8497><s%> tuk-Ku and they sat down לְרַגְלֶ֔ךָ <S%H7272><s%> le-rag-Le-cha, at thy feet יִשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa [every one] shall receive מִדַּבְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1703><s%> mid-dab-be-ro-Tei-cha. of thy words

תּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> to-Rah us a law צִוָּה־ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vah- commanded לָ֖נוּ La-nu מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; Moses מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <S%H4181><s%> mo-ra-Shah [even] the inheritance קְהִלַּ֥ת <S%H6952><s%> ke-hil-Lat of the congregation יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בִישֻׁר֖וּן <S%H3484><s%> vi-shu-Run in Jeshurun מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech; And he was king בְּהִתְאַסֵּף֙ <S%H622><s%> be-hit-'as-Sef were gathered רָ֣אשֵׁי <S%H7218><s%> Ra-shei when the heads עָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> 'Am, of the people יַ֖חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad together שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei [and] the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

יְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> ye-Chi live רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven Let Reuben וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- Nor יָמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mot; and not die וִיהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vi-Hi become מְתָ֖יו <S%H4962><s%> me-Tav and let [not] his men מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par. be few ס sa-Mek

וְזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> ve-Zot regarding לִֽיהוּדָה֮ <S%H3063><s%> li-hu-Dah And this [is the blessing] of Judah וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar and he said שְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' Hear יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo him unto his people תְּבִיאֶ֑נּוּ <S%H935><s%> te-vi-'En-nu; and bring יָדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav let his hands רָ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> rav be sufficient ל֔וֹ lo, וְעֵ֥זֶר <S%H5828><s%> ve-'E-zer for him and be thou an help מִצָּרָ֖יו <S%H6862><s%> mitz-tza-Rav [to him] from his enemies תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh. become ס sa-Mek

וּלְלֵוִ֣י <S%H3878><s%> u-le-le-Vi And of Levi אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, he said תֻּמֶּ֥יךָ <S%H8550><s%> tum-Mei-cha [Let] thy Thummim וְאוּרֶ֖יךָ <S%H224><s%> ve-'u-Rei-cha and thy Urim לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish one חֲסִידֶ֑ךָ <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-De-cha; [be] with thy holy אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Whom נִסִּיתוֹ֙ <S%H5254><s%> nis-si-To whom thou didst prove בְּמַסָּ֔ה <S%H4532><s%> be-mas-Sah, at Massah תְּרִיבֵ֖הוּ <S%H7378><s%> te-ri-Ve-hu [and with] whom thou didst strive עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> mei at the waters מְרִיבָֽה׃ <S%H4809><s%> me-ri-Vah. of Meribah

הָאֹמֵ֞ר <S%H559><s%> ha-'o-Mer Who said לְאָבִ֤יו <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Viv unto his father וּלְאִמּוֹ֙ <S%H517><s%> u-le-'im-Mo and to his mother לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor רְאִיתִ֔יו <S%H7200><s%> re-'i-Tiv, I have not seen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav his brethren לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor הִכִּ֔יר <S%H5234><s%> hik-Kir, him neither did he acknowledge וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et ; בָּנֹו ba-nov כבָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav afflicted קלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יָדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'; nor knew כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Ru for they have observed אִמְרָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H565><s%> 'im-ra-Te-cha, thy word וּבְרִֽיתְךָ֖ <S%H1285><s%> u-ve-ri-te-Cha thy covenant יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H5341><s%> yin-Tzo-ru. and kept

יוֹר֤וּ <S%H3384><s%> yo-Ru They shall teach מִשְׁפָּטֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tei-cha thy judgments לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> le-ya-'a-Ko, Jacob וְתוֹרָתְךָ֖ <S%H8451><s%> ve-to-ra-te-Cha thy law לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El; and Israel יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> ya-Si-mu they shall put קְטוֹרָה֙ <S%H6988><s%> ke-to-Rah incense בְּאַפֶּ֔ךָ <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-Pe-cha, before וְכָלִ֖יל <S%H3632><s%> ve-cha-Lil thee and whole burnt sacrifice עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מִזְבְּחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Che-cha. upon thine altar

בָּרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Rech Bless יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2428><s%> chei-Lo, his substance וּפֹ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> u-Fo-'al the work יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav of his hands תִּרְצֶ֑ה <S%H7521><s%> tir-Tzeh; and accept מְחַ֨ץ <S%H4272><s%> me-Chatz smite מָתְנַ֧יִם <S%H4975><s%> ma-te-Na-yim through the loins קָמָ֛יו <S%H6965><s%> ka-Mav of them that rise וּמְשַׂנְאָ֖יו <S%H8130><s%> u-me-san-'Av against him and of them that hate מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- not יְקוּמֽוּן׃ <S%H6965><s%> ye-ku-Mun. again ס sa-Mek

לְבִנְיָמִ֣ן <S%H1144><s%> le-vin-ya-Min [And] of Benjamin אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, he said יְדִ֣יד <S%H3039><s%> ye-Did The beloved יְהֹוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> yish-Kon shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach in safety עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; and חֹפֵ֤ף <S%H2653><s%> cho-Fef by him [and the LORD] shall cover עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, him all the day וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between כְּתֵיפָ֖יו <S%H3802><s%> ke-tei-Fav between his shoulders שָׁכֵֽן׃ <S%H7931><s%> sha-Chen. long and he shall dwell ס sa-Mek

וּלְיוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> u-le-yo-Sef And of Joseph אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, he said מְבֹרֶ֥כֶת <S%H1288><s%> me-vo-Re-chet Blessed יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> ar-Tzo; [be] his land מִמֶּ֤גֶד <S%H4022><s%> mi-Me-ged for the precious things שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim of heaven מִטָּ֔ל <S%H2919><s%> mit-Tal, for the dew וּמִתְּה֖וֹם <S%H8415><s%> u-mit-te-Hom and for the deep רֹבֶ֥צֶת <S%H7257><s%> ro-Ve-tzet that coucheth beneath תָּֽחַת׃ <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat. beneath

וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <S%H4022><s%> u-mi-Me-ged And for the precious תְּבוּאֹ֣ת <S%H8393><s%> te-vu-'Ot fruits שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> Sha-mesh; [brought forth] by the sun וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <S%H4022><s%> u-mi-Me-ged and for the precious things גֶּ֥רֶשׁ <S%H1645><s%> Ge-resh put forth יְרָחִֽים׃ <S%H3391><s%> ye-ra-Chim. by the moon

וּמֵרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> u-me-Rosh And for the chief things הַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> har-rei- mountains קֶ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem; of the ancient וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <S%H4022><s%> u-mi-Me-ged and for the precious things גִּבְע֥וֹת <S%H1389><s%> giv-'ot hills עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. of the lasting

וּמִמֶּ֗גֶד <S%H4022><s%> u-mi-Me-ged, And for the precious things אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the earth וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <S%H4393><s%> u-me-lo-'Ah, and fulness וּרְצ֥וֹן <S%H7522><s%> u-re-Tzon thereof and [for] the good will שֹׁכְנִ֖י <S%H7931><s%> sho-che-Ni of him that dwelt סְנֶ֑ה <S%H5572><s%> se-Neh; in the bush תָּב֙וֹאתָה֙ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo-tah let [the blessing] come לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh upon the head יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, of Joseph וּלְקָדְקֹ֖ד <S%H6936><s%> u-le-ka-de-Kod and upon the top of the head נְזִ֥יר <S%H5139><s%> ne-Zir of him [that was] separated אֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav. from his brethren

בְּכ֨וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor [is like] the firstling שׁוֹר֜וֹ <S%H7794><s%> sho-Ro of his bullock הָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> ha-Dar His glory ל֗וֹ lo, וְקַרְנֵ֤י <S%H7161><s%> ve-kar-Nei and his horns רְאֵם֙ <S%H7214><s%> re-'Em of unicorns קַרְנָ֔יו <S%H7161><s%> kar-Nav, [are like] the horns בָּהֶ֗ם ba-Hem, עַמִּ֛ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim the people יְנַגַּ֥ח <S%H5055><s%> ye-nag-Gach with them he shall push יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> 'af-sei- to the ends אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; of the earth וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem and those רִבְב֣וֹת <S%H7233><s%> riv-Vot and they [are] the ten thousands אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem and those אַלְפֵ֥י <S%H505><s%> 'al-Fei and they [are] the thousands מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh ס sa-Mek

וְלִזְבוּלֻ֣ן <S%H2074><s%> ve-liz-vu-Lun And of Zebulun אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, he said שְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> se-Mach Rejoice זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun Zebulun בְּצֵאתֶ֑ךָ <S%H3318><s%> be-tze-Te-cha; in thy going out וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> ve-yis-so-sh-Char and Issachar בְּאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H168><s%> be-'o-ha-Lei-cha. in thy tents

עַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim the people הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- unto the mountain יִקְרָ֔אוּ <S%H7121><s%> yik-Ra-'u, They shall call שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham There יִזְבְּח֣וּ <S%H2076><s%> yiz-be-Chu there they shall offer זִבְחֵי־ <S%H2077><s%> ziv-chei- sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek; of righteousness כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki out שֶׁ֤פַע <S%H8228><s%> She-fa' [of] the abundance יַמִּים֙ <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim of the seas יִינָ֔קוּ <S%H3243><s%> yi-Na-ku, for they shall suck וּשְׂפוּנֵ֖י <S%H8226><s%> u-se-fu-Nei and [of] treasures טְמ֥וּנֵי <S%H2934><s%> te-Mu-nei hid חֽוֹל׃ <S%H2344><s%> Chol. in the sand ס sa-Mek

וּלְגָ֣ד <S%H1410><s%> u-le-Gad And of Gad אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, he said בָּר֖וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed מַרְחִ֣יב <S%H7337><s%> mar-Chiv [be] he that enlargeth גָּ֑ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad; Gad כְּלָבִ֣יא <S%H3833><s%> ke-la-Vi as a lion שָׁכֵ֔ן <S%H7931><s%> sha-Chen, he dwelleth וְטָרַ֥ף <S%H2963><s%> ve-ta-Raf and teareth זְר֖וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> ze-Ro-a' the arm אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- with קָדְקֹֽד׃ <S%H6936><s%> ka-de-Kod. the crown of the head
